name: City 3310
description:
If game does not load, try a different browser. Chrome did not work for me. This is a bug that I have no idea how to fix, no combinations of WebGL compression settings got it to work. Edge worked for me.

Game for the Nokia 3310 Game Jam.

Want to see a higher resolution version? : Check this out

This game ended up acting as more of an artstyle/shader showcase, given that the gameplay itself ended up being not that interactive

There may be a momentary black screen while going between transitions, I couldn't find a way to stop this unfortunately. I'll look into it into the future.

Admittedly, I find the game not that entertaining, however I am really proud of the shader I developed for this game jam and may use it in a future project (With a higher resolution and less restrictions of course)

Controls
  • WASD - Move
  • ←↑↓→ - Look
  • Space - Jump
  • E - Interact
  • Q - Shoot

After winning, if you press Q, you will enter God mode!
